medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports inability to tolerate PO including liquids and food starting 3 days prior to presentation. She has experienced chills during this time, 2 episodes of loose stools 2 days ago, followed by absence of stools. Denies fevers or abdominal pain. Patient has noted worsening anxiety with palpitations and midline chest pain, which is now improved.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cirrhosis/chronic liver disease, anxiety, status post right varicose vein ablation, irregular menses, seasonal allergies, migraine headaches improved after treatment.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with osteoarthritis and hypertension, Father with rheumatoid arthritis, Uncle with colon cancer, mother with likely depression.
